summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3727 , for the improvement of 35th Avenue Northeast, from the south margin of East 55th Street to East 65th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45759 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
